text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, cun ʙa namoz ʙarxosted, rujhovu dasthojatonro to orinc ʙisued va sari xudro mash kased, pohojatonro to quzak (ʙuculak) ʙisued. Va agar cunuʙ (oluda) ʙuded, xudro pok sozed. Va agar ʙemor jo dar safar ʙuded, jo az coi qazoi xocat omada ʙuded, jo ʙo zanon nazdiki karda ʙuded va oʙ najofted, ʙo xoki pok tajammum kuned va suratu dasthojatonro ʙo on mahe kuned. Xudo namexohad sumo dar ranc afted, ʙalki mexohad, ki sumoro pokiza sozad va ne'matasro ʙar sumo komil kunad, ʙosad, ki sukr kuned
